SENT.plain: In Thailand aplastic anemia and thalassemias as well as leukemias and lymphomas are prevalent
Bone marrow transplantation has been used to cure these patients
The results are more favorable in non-malignant diseases than in hematological malignancies
The incidence of GVHD and CMV infection is low
There are still some unresolved problems, especially lack of personnel, limited facilities and high cost
